safetyTips: We only allow one person into the restaurant at all times and when delivering we offer a hands-free delivery service if you wish. All our staff wear gloves and wash their hands every 20 minutes as advised by the government. We also use hand sanitiser and have a sanitiser spray that is used on top of our daily cleaning routine.
name: Eighty Ate Burger
description: Our menu features an array of juicy, succulent meats that are sourced from a local butcher here in Reigate. As a burger lover, we encourage you to come along and try our eccentric burgers! We are currently open for takeaway and delivery service. We offer a delivery service within a 5 mile radius of the restaurant, alongside this we are also on Deliveroo and they offer a 3 mile radius from the restaurant.
